:::Torca:::

Torca: A full ship? A whole army of Decepticons?  Alright, we are in deep 
sh*t(please excuse my language).
::He follows Cliffjumper to the hill::
Torca:  If it comes to battle, we're probably outnumbered.  What should we do?
